items.title: EFF Challenges Government Surveillance Overreach
items.summary: The Electronic Frontier Foundation files legal challenge against expanded government surveillance programs that lack proper oversight and threaten digital privacy rights.

items.title: Tor Browser 13.5 Released with Enhanced Security
items.summary: Latest Tor Browser release includes improved circuit security, updated NoScript integration, and enhanced protection against browser fingerprinting attacks.

items.title: Investigation: How Police Facial Recognition Systems Fail
items.summary: New analysis reveals widespread accuracy problems in police facial recognition systems, with misidentification rates particularly high for minority communities.

items.title: Mullvad VPN Adds New Privacy Features
items.summary: Mullvad introduces enhanced DAITA traffic analysis protection and expanded server network to provide users with stronger anonymity and improved performance.

items.title: Mozilla Fights Tracking in Firefox 119
items.summary: Firefox 119 introduces stricter default tracking protection settings and improved fingerprinting resistance to better protect user privacy across the web.
